name: Mumbai
description: Mumbai is a densely populated city on India’s west coast. A financial center, its Indias largest city

name: Hawaii
description: Hawaii is a state in the Western United States located in the Pacific Ocean about 2,000 miles from the U.S. mainland

name: Sydney
description: Sydney, capital of New South Wales and one of Australias largest cities, is best known for its harbourfront Sydney Opera House, with a distinctive sail-like design

name: Paris
description: Paris, Frances capital, is a major European city and a global center for art, fashion, gastronomy and culture

name: Tokyo
description: Tokyo, Japan’s busy capital, mixes the ultramodern and the traditional, from neon-lit skyscrapers to historic temples

name: Egypt
description: Egypt, a country linking northeast Africa with the Middle East, dates to the time of the pharaohs. Millennia-old monuments sit along the fertile Nile
